message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you a chance to purchase this truly unique product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I believe this reflects the significant benefit you'll gain from it.
I appreciate the value you see in this product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000.
Bob, I understand your perspective.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000.
Bob, it seems we're getting close. I'm willing to accept $1,300,000 for the product. This is a significant reduction from my original asking price, and I believe it's a fair deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit below my target. I'd be willing to meet you at $1,280,000.
